com.cogi.audioprocessor

Class WaveformVector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cogi.audioprocessor.WaveformVector

  • public class WaveformVector
extends java.lang.Object
    Vector of values representing a waveform for an audio file.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static WaveformVector generateFromMp3(java.io.InputStream is, int duration, int targetSize)
      Factory method for generating a vector based on an mp3 file.
      static WaveformVector generateFromWav(java.io.InputStream is, int targetSize)
      Factory method for generating a vector based on a wav file.

      Returns the size of the vector.
      int getValue(int index)
      Returns the value of the vector at the specified index

    • Method Detail

      • write

        public void write(java.io.OutputStream os)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the vector to an output stream.
        Parameters:
        os - Output stream of interest.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is a problem writing

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Returns the size of the vector.
        Returns:
        Size of the vector

      • getValue

        public int getValue(int index)
        Returns the value of the vector at the specified index
        Parameters:
        index - Index, must be less than getSize()
        Returns:
        Waveform vector height expressing the energy in the waveform at the specified position. Value will be between 0 and 255.

      • generateFromWav

        public static WaveformVector generateFromWav(java.io.InputStream is,
                                             int targetSize)
                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Factory method for generating a vector based on a wav file.
        Parameters:
        is - Input stream to the audio file. Stream will be closed once this method has finished.
        targetSize - Target size of the vector
        Returns:
        vector, won't be null
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is a problem reading the audio file

      • generateFromMp3

        public static WaveformVector generateFromMp3(java.io.InputStream is,
                                             int duration,
                                             int targetSize)
                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Factory method for generating a vector based on an mp3 file.
        Parameters:
        is - Input stream to the audio file. Stream will be closed once this method has finished.
        duration - Duration of the audio file in ms
        targetSize - Target size of the vector
        Returns:
        vector, won't be null
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is a problem reading the audio file
